item.title: At least 5 potholes in stretch, 14th December
item.description:
At least 5 pot holes along this short stretch or road, if your staff drive along this road to this hole they will see several and can park and be proactive and fix
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Numerous potholes in this area! Terrible!, 14th December
item.description:
Multiple potholes, some of which are deep. This needs addressing urgently as this is a very busy road. Particularly bad on the left hand side towards Princess Elizabeth Way. They have been filled previously, but the whole area needs resurfacing as it keeps breaking down and reoccurring.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 46, Shelley Road, St Mark's, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
